item.title: Some McCain supporters are sane
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: To their credit, some McCain supporters, including a McCain campaign spokesman, ran a couple out of their rally in Woodbridge, VA who were passing out bumper stickers implying that Obama is a "socialist with ties to radical Islam": Video removed because it auto-starts which is really annoying. See it here. I wonder how many of these morons who claim Obama is a socialist even know what socialism is. The idiots in this video obviously don't. They used the Communist hammer and sickle, clearly confused between communism and socialism.
